name: Shadow Elf Mage
description: The Shadow Elf Mage is a medium humanoid, skilled in arcane arts, with an aura of mystery. It has sharp features typical of elves, with an air of confidence typically associated with powerful magic users.
memorable: Notable for its powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Cloudkill, the Shadow Elf Mage can effectively control the battlefield.
goals: Typically seeks to gain power and knowledge, often through mastery of magic.
relations: May be found with other shadow creatures or allies, possibly working with other spellcasters.
environment: Commonly found in dark forests or ancient ruins rich with magical energy.
strengths: Excels in spellcasting, particularly with area control spells and powerful attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to direct physical attacks, especially when defensive spells are absent.
attacks: Uses a dagger for melee, and can deliver ranged spells like Fire Bolt and Lightning Bolt.
most_powerful_ability: Cloudkill creates a lethal area of poisonous fog, damaging any creature that enters or starts its turn within it.
skills: Proficient in arcana, history, investigation, and has reasonable perception.
additional_information: Can cast Darkness and Faerie Fire innately without material components.
Counterspell allows it to thwart enemies' magical attacks.
Greater Invisibility can keep it hidden from enemies.
Capable of teleportation with Dimension Door.
spellcasting: A 9th level spellcaster with access to high-level spells such as Cloudkill and Lightning Bolt.
test_queries: powerful shadow mage with spellcasting abilities
arcane elf that controls the battlefield
shadow elf adept in magic and agility
mage capable of teleportation and invisibility
